Text: Short Meeting to Catch up on Legal Docsafternoon all I was wondering if we might be able to schedule an appointment sometime tomorrow to go over the status and procedure for Net Works Originations legal docs so we can create a new system of maintaining a status report I think minutes of your time is all we need and if you could please email or call me back with a set of times that would work best for you so I can schedule a short meeting Thank you Stephanie Segura x

Discuss Legal Docs Status and RequirementsFriday April PM PM GMT Central Time US Canada Where EB Hello all Meeting to discuss Net Works Legal Docs Current Status Procedure for keeping a fresh status update Specific permissionsprohibitions of each type of legal doc Thank you Stephanie Segura x

RE Offline Agreements Cc These agreements pertain to telecom deals that are currently dormant Stephanie PS When sending email to our group please be sure to send messages to Mark S Palmer as the other Mark Palmer is a VP in the PR department Thank you Original Message From Young Kay Sent Tuesday April PM To Jones Tana Cc McCullough Travis Segura Stephanie Palmer Mark Subject Offline Agreements Tana et al This list indicates the agreements that I have as relating to the Offline Project I thought we had come to an agreement with Sun Microsystems Inc separately from iPlanet Let me know if anyone has an executed version Im not sure AfricaOne and Ejasent are Offline agreements Stephanie and Mark let me know File Offlinertf Kay C Young Legal Specialist Enron North America Corp Phone Fax

London EOL Financial GTCsI just left you a voice mail about the European GTCs as compared to the North American documents Attached please find both versions of the documents European documents are below attached email for collateral and noncollateral situations If you could please take a look at the documents and determine whether changes need to be made or we can proceed with posting these documents for European trading in pulp and paper products we would appreciate it If you would prefer I have a set of documents Ive marked up for differences if that would ease your task Please call if you have any further questions Thanks Stephanie Segura x Forwarded by Stephanie SeguraHOUECT on AM Enron North America Corp From Jeff Harbert AM To Stephanie CT cc Brandon CT Subject London EOL Financial GTCs Stephanie Below you will find some data and information about EOL London as well as the GTCs used by them Please just look these over for me and note any differences you might find beside the obvious Enron entity name difference Ill be working with Debbie Nichols and Amita Gosalia in London as we move forward in getting products up on Clickpaper for our London traders Jeff Forwarded by Jeff HarbertHOUECT on AM Robert B Cass PM To Jeff CT cc Dale CT Melba CT Subject London EOL Financial GTCs Jeff Some of the info below may not necessarily be new but its free I have contacted Debbie Nicholls Documentation Manager in the London office to verify that the financial GTCs as attached below are the same GTCs that would be used for EOL traded PaperLumber etc products in the London office Both of these attached GTCs are the same with the exception that the file for GTC includes collateral arrangements for customers with credit issues Jeff please note that these EOL GTCs are used for all of the London financial products including paper etc under the following Enron entity Enron Capital Trade Resources International Corp Enron acting by its agent Enron Europe Finance Trading Limited these GTCs are referred to as the ECTRIC EEFT GTCs Due to some recent reorganizational changes in the London office there is some uncertainty as to which group will manage the pulppaperlumber products For now the documentation activity for the financial transactions does reside with Debbie The documentation for the physical paperlumber transactions is not done in London That documentation is done in the Houston office The attached GTCs are governed by English Law According to Debbie they cover all financial products However I do know that the Legal Group created GTCs for financial EOL products which referenced other countries for governing law eg I have one other GTC that reflects German Law Earlier this year a decision was made to use only the English Law GTCs but we may need to confirm that with Debbie and with the London Legal group there That decision may need to be revisited
